name: Spinach Kale Bacon Dip
author: 14 Hands Winery
summary: Who doesn't love a classic spinach dip? Adding bacon and kale to this recipe gives it the perfect 14 Hands twist. Pair this appetizer with our bold Stampede Red Blend.
ingredients: 1 (10 ounce) package frozen chopped spinach, thawed and drained
1 (8 ounce) package shredded extra-sharp Cheddar cheese
directions: Cook bacon in a non-stick pan over medium-high heat until crispy and browned, 8 to 10 minutes
Remove bacon from pan and drain onto paper towels, then chop into pieces
Cook onions in the same pan over medium-low heat for 5 minutes
Add the kale and thawed spinach; cook for another 5 minutes
Combine cream cheese, Cheddar, and heavy cream in another pot
Add bacon and spinach mixture to the cheese
Pour into an oven-safe baking dish
Bake for 20 minutes or until bubbly
